primaryContact.name: John Doe
primaryContact.message: I'm very interested in adopting this wonderful cat. I have experience with pets and can provide a loving home.

secondaryContact.name: Jane Smith
secondaryContact.message: This cat looks perfect for our family! We have children who love animals.

longMessage.name: Long Message Test
longMessage.message: This is a very long message to test the character limit and textarea behavior in the contact form. It should handle long messages gracefully and potentially show character count or limit warnings if implemented. This message is intentionally verbose to test edge cases in form handling and submission processes.
